physical_examinations.vital_signs: Serum manganese was elevated at 2.6 ng/mL (normal: 0.4â€“0.85 ng/mL).
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: MRI follow-up 5 months later showed improvement in the brain abscess and increased MRI signal on T1-weighted sequences from the globus pallidus to the substantia nigra.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Improvement in the brain abscess noted on follow-up MRI.
